cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers

Class WekaClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.man.ac.uk.common.Base
      • cs.man.ac.uk.classifiers.BaseClassifier
        • cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers.WekaClassifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MOAClassifier, StandardAlgorithmTester

    public class WekaClassifier
extends BaseClassifier
    The class defines the basic type of WEKA classifier.
    Version:
    1.0, 05/02/13
    Author:
    Rob Lyon

      • getFeatures

        public java.lang.String getFeatures(Instance instance,
                                    int attributes)
        Obtains the features (attributes) belonging to a instance within the ARFF file being classified. Returns these in a comma delimited string.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance whose score values should be obtained.
        attributes - number of feature attributes to expect.
        Returns:
        a comma delimited string containing the scores.

      • missclassificationsToARFF

        public void missclassificationsToARFF(java.lang.String path,
                                      java.lang.String missclassifications,
                                      int attributes)
        Records miss-classified instances in an ARFF file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file to store miss-classified instances.
        missclassifications - a string containing the miss-classified instances (assumed separated by newlines).
        attributes - the number of attributes possessed by the data.

      • ProducePredictionsARFFHeader

        public void ProducePredictionsARFFHeader(java.lang.String path,
                                         int attributes)
        Records predictions in an ARFF file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file to store predictions.
        attributes - the number of attributes possessed by the data.
